H0.text: Who became the ruler of Russia in 1964 until his death in 1982. Nikita Khrushchev

H1.text: Who became the ruler of Russia in 1964 until his death in 1982. Alexei Kosygin

H2.text: Who became the ruler of Russia in 1964 until his death in 1982. Leonid Korniyets

H3.text: Who became the ruler of Russia in 1964 until his death in 1982. Brežněv

A4.text: Brezhnev became the de jure supreme authority of the Soviet Union upon replacing Khrushchev in 1964.

A5.text: Brezhnev served as General Secretary of the CPSU from 1964 until his death in 1982.
